heroSection.description: A septic service truck from Stain Plumbing and Construction LLC parked in front of a residential home, ready to provide septic pumping and installation services.
heroSection.callToAction: Keep your septic system running smoothly. Call Stain Plumbing and Construction LLC for reliable septic services.

heroSection.callToAction: Don't let septic issues disrupt your daily life. Trust Stain Plumbing and Construction LLC for professional septic services.

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Mary Jones
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Identified problem and fixed my toilet. Quick and efficient. Did not leave a mess.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.address: 17345 Mooresville Rd, Athens, AL 35613, United States
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Stain Plumbing and Construction LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Travis Curtis Sr
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Great job resolving my plumbing issues!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Glad we could help with your issues..
googleReviewsBySlug.json.address: 17345 Mooresville Rd, Athens, AL 35613, United States
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Stain Plumbing and Construction LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Roderick Martin
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Christian is the man!  I had a septic system right on a fence line that needed to be removed and have a new one put in a few feet away.  Stain rocked it so fast and profesh.  Within a couple days they had pulled the permit, dug the hole put the new tank in and had everything up and running again.  They even moved the junction box up onto the house instead of out in the grass where it got damaged last time and closed the permit right away.  Pricing is super fair and they go above and beyond.  Thanks you guys!!!!!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText:
Ty for the review.
 If we can serve u in any way let us know
googleReviewsBySlug.json.address: 17345 Mooresville Rd, Athens, AL 35613, United States
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Stain Plumbing and Construction LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Kristopher Gast
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Very Professional!!! We had an issue with our septic system causing a backup. The tech quickly diagnosed the problem with a simple solution not requiring the tank to be pumped unlike the "big named company" which pumped the tank and ran a year and a half ago. I highly recommend Stain Plumbing!!!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank u for the review... We were glad to get u took care of...
googleReviewsBySlug.json.address: 17345 Mooresville Rd, Athens, AL 35613, United States
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Stain Plumbing and Construction LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Tanuj Malhotra
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I had two different plumbers come to my house to fix my sink's water pressure without any solution. Stain plumbing was able to identify the problem and fix it right away getting me a new faucet in a timely manner. They know what they're doing, very responsive, do quality work and were a pleasure to work with.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you for the awesome review.. We take pride in what we do to service our customers and keep them happy..
googleReviewsBySlug.json.address: 17345 Mooresville Rd, Athens, AL 35613, United States
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Stain Plumbing and Construction LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Robert Williams

plumberResearchFull.json:
Here is the detailed information about Stain Plumbing and Construction LLC, based on the provided identifiers:

## Business Information:

- **Alabama Business Registration/License Details**:
  - Stain Plumbing and Construction LLC is incorporated as a Limited Liability Company (LLC) and was incorporated on July 6, 2016[1][4].
  - The business is in an industry that may require professional licensing, and it is advised to check with the Alabama Home Builders Licensure Board and the State of Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board to ensure all requirements are met[1].

- **Physical Location and Service Areas**:
  - The physical location is 17345 Mooresville Rd, Athens, AL 35613. The service area is not explicitly stated, but it is associated with the BBB serving North Alabama[1][4].

- **Hours and Payment Methods**:
  - Specific hours of operation are not provided in the available sources. However, the business offers free estimates that are flexible according to materials and scheduling[2].

- **Years in Operation**:
  - The business started on January 1, 2016, and has been in operation for approximately 9 years as of the current date[1].

## Services & Specialties:

- **Types of Services Offered**:
  - Stain Plumbing and Construction LLC offers a wide range of services including plumbing, construction services, handyman services, septic tank cleaning, septic tank contractors, kitchen remodeling, bathroom design, and plumbing renovation[1].

- **Service Areas Covered**:
  - While the exact service areas are not detailed, the business is based in Athens, AL, and serves the surrounding regions under the BBB serving North Alabama[1].

- **Emergency Service Availability**:
  - There is no explicit mention of emergency service availability in the provided sources.

- **Any Listed Prices or Rates**:
  - There is no detailed pricing information available in the sources. However, the business offers free estimates[2].

## Customer Reviews & Reputation:

- **Review Summaries with Specific Examples**:
  - The business has a 4.8 rating based on 9 reviews, indicating a high level of customer satisfaction. However, specific review summaries are not provided in the sources.

- **BBB Rating and Status**:
  - Stain Plumbing and Construction LLC is BBB Accredited since August 11, 2018, and holds an A+ BBB rating[1][4].

- **Common Customer Feedback Themes**:
  - While specific themes are not detailed, the high rating suggests positive feedback on service quality, professionalism, and reliability.

- **Response to Reviews**:
  - The business adheres to BBB standards, which include addressing disputes quickly and in good faith, and participating in mediation or arbitration as requested by BBB[4].

## Owner & Staff:

- **Owner/Management Information**:
  - The owner of Stain Plumbing and Construction LLC is Mr. Christian McGowan[1][4].

- **Staff Qualifications**:
  - There is no detailed information on staff qualifications available in the sources.

- **Professional Certifications**:
  - The business is expected to fulfill all competency and trade licensing requirements as part of its BBB accreditation, but specific certifications are not listed[1][4].
aboutUs: Stain Plumbing and Construction LLC is a premier local plumbing and construction company serving the Athens, AL area. Our team of skilled professionals specializes in a wide range of services, from plumbing and septic tank maintenance to kitchen and bathroom remodeling. With a commitment to excellence, we deliver top-notch workmanship and unparalleled customer service.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with choosing a trusted and BBB-accredited plumbing and construction partner.
sellingPoints: Comprehensive expertise: Our team is well-versed in all aspects of plumbing, construction, and remodeling, ensuring a seamless and efficient project from start to finish.
Meticulous craftsmanship: We take pride in our attention to detail and commitment to delivering exceptional results that exceed industry standards.
Personalized service: Our customer-centric approach ensures that your unique needs and preferences are carefully considered, resulting in tailored solutions that meet your specific requirements.
